Description_lang: Increases the damage dealt by your Rip, Maul, and Ferocious Bite abilities by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage dealt by your Rip, Maul, and Ferocious Bite abilities by 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta el daño infligido por tus facultades Destripar, Gran maza y Mordedura feroz un 15%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 15% o dano causado pelas suas habilidades Rasgar, Arrebentar e Mordida Feroz.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den von Euren Fähigkeiten 'Zerfetzen', 'Zermalmen' und 'Wilder Biss' verursachten Schaden um 15%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage dealt by your Rip, Maul, and Ferocious Bite abilities by 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta el daño que infligen tus facultades Destripar, Magullar y Mordedura feroz un 15%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts infligés par vos techniques Déchirure, Mutiler et Morsure féroce de 15%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Squarcio, Zampata e Morso Feroce del 15%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает урон от "Разорвать", "Трепки" и "Свирепого укуса", на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 도려내기, 후려갈기기, 흉포한 이빨의 공격력이 15%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你撕扯、割碎和兇猛撕咬所造成的傷害提高15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的割裂、重殴和凶猛撕咬技能所造成的伤害提高15%。
